org.apache.batik.svggen
Interface CachedImageHandler

All Superinterfaces:
GenericImageHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
CachedImageHandlerBase64Encoder, CachedImageHandlerJPEGEncoder, CachedImageHandlerPNGEncoder, DefaultCachedImageHandler
public interface CachedImageHandler
extends GenericImageHandler

Extends the default ImageHandler interface with calls to allow caching of raster images in generated SVG content.

Method Summary

          Returns the image cache instance in use by this handler
